metadata.title: CVE-2023-23599

platform: Open Enterprise Server 23.4
Open Enterprise Server 24.4

metadata.description: When copying a network request from the developer tools panel as a curl command the output was not being properly sanitized and could allow arbitrary commands to be hidden within. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 109, Thunderbird < 102.7, and Firefox ESR < 102.7.
